description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Members prior to versions 2.4.85.11 in Android O(8.1) and below, and 3.9.10.11 in Android P(9.0) and above allows untrusted applications to cause local file inclusion in webview.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: - <2.4.85.11 in Android O(8.1) and below, and 3.9.10.11 in Android P(9.0) and above
